com.hush.pgp
Class KeyGenerator

java.lang.Object
  com.hush.pgp.KeyGenerator
All Implemented Interfaces:
PgpConstants
public class KeyGenerator
extends java.lang.Object
implements PgpConstants

This class generates a complete set of PGP keys.

addPreferredHashAlgorithm

public void addPreferredHashAlgorithm(int algorithm)
Add the preferred hash algorithms for the key to be generated. The first algorithm added will have the first preference.
